trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell-Systemanforderungen

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell-Systemanforderungen

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the system requirements for Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0, and for special features, such as Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE), CIM commands, and workflows.
trans-unit.target: In diesem Thema werden die Systemanforderungen für Windows PowerShell 3.0 und Windows PowerShell 4.0 sowie für besondere Features wie Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE), CIM-Befehle und Workflows aufgeführt.

trans-unit.source: Windows® 8.1 and Windows Server® 2012 R2 include all required programs.
trans-unit.target: Windows® 8.1 und Windows Server® 2012 R2 enthalten alle erforderlichen Programme.

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed for users of earlier releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Thema ist für Benutzer früherer Versionen von Windows gedacht.

trans-unit.source: Operating System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Betriebssystemanforderungen

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 4.0 wird unter den folgenden Versionen von Windows ausgeführt.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1, standardmäßig installiert

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2, standardmäßig installiert

trans-unit.source: Windows® 7 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run Windows PowerShell 4.0
trans-unit.target: Windows® 7 mit Service Pack 1, [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) zum Ausführen von Windows PowerShell 4.0 installieren

trans-unit.source: Windows Server® 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run Windows PowerShell 4.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server® 2008 R2 mit Service Pack 1, [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) zum Ausführen von Windows PowerShell 4.0 installieren

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 wird unter den folgenden Versionen von Windows ausgeführt.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows 8, standardmäßig installiert

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012, standardmäßig installiert

trans-unit.source: Windows® 7 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows® 7 mit Service Pack 1, [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) zum Ausführen von Windows PowerShell 3.0 installieren

trans-unit.source: Windows Server® 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server® 2008 R2 mit Service Pack 1, [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) zum Ausführen von Windows PowerShell 3.0 installieren

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 with Service Pack 2, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 mit Service Pack 2, [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) zum Ausführen von Windows PowerShell 3.0 installieren

trans-unit.source: Microsoft .NET Framework Requirements
trans-unit.target: Microsoft .NET Framework-Anforderungen

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 4.0 erfordert die vollständige Installation von Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2 include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1 und Windows Server 2012 R2 enthalten standardmäßig Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 erfordert die vollständige Installation von Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default, which fulfills this requirement.
trans-unit.target: In Windows 8 und Windows Server 2012 ist Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 standardmäßig enthalten, wodurch diese Anforderung erfüllt ist.

trans-unit.source: To install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Informationen zum Installieren von Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) finden Sie im Microsoft Download Center unter [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: To install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Informationen zur vollständigen Installation von Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) finden Sie im Microsoft Download Center unter [Microsoft .NET Framework 4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931).

trans-unit.source: WS\-Management 3.0
trans-unit.target: WS-Management 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 require WS\-Management 3.0, which supports the WinRM service and WSMan protocol.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 und Windows PowerShell 4.0 erfordern WS-Management 3.0, das den WinRM-Dienst und das WSMan-Protokoll unterstützt.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0, and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Programm ist in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0 und Windows Management Framework 3.0 enthalten.

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows-Verwaltungsinstrumentation 3.0 (Windows Management Instrumentation, WMI)

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 require Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI).
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 und Windows PowerShell 4.0 erfordern Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (Windows-Verwaltungsinstrumentation, WMI).

trans-unit.source: This program is included in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0, and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Programm ist in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0 und Windows Management Framework 3.0 enthalten.

trans-unit.source: If this program is not installed on the computer, features that require WMI, such as CIM commands, do not run.
trans-unit.target: Wenn dieses Programm nicht auf dem Computer installiert ist, werden Features, die WMI erfordern, wie z. B. CIM-Befehle, nicht ausgeführt.

trans-unit.source: Common Language Runtime 4.0
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 are compiled against Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 und Windows PowerShell 4.0 werden für Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0 kompiliert.

trans-unit.source: Graphical User Interface Requirements
trans-unit.target: Anforderungen an die grafische Benutzeroberfläche

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell is a console\-based application that does not require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell ist eine konsolenbasierte Anwendung, die keine grafische Benutzeroberfläche erfordert.

trans-unit.source: As such, is it well suited to computers that do not have screens or monitors, or a user interface, such as the Server Core installation options of Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: Deshalb eignet sie sich gut für Computer ohne Bildschirm oder Monitor bzw. ohne Benutzeroberfläche, z. B. die Server Core-Installationsoptionen von Windows Server 2012 R2 oder Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: However, some items, such as the following, require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: Allerdings erfordern einige Elemente, wie z. B. die folgenden, eine grafische Benutzeroberfläche.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the help topic for each item.
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen finden Sie im Hilfethema des jeweiligen Elements.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE)
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE)

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: **ShowWindow** parameter of the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **ShowWindow**-Parameter des Cmdlets [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a).

trans-unit.source: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUI** parameter of the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) and [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUI**-Parameter der Cmdlets [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) und [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea).

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Engine Requirements
trans-unit.target: Anforderungen an das Windows PowerShell-Modul

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 is designed to be backwards compatible with Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 4.0 ist mit Windows PowerShell 3.0 und Windows PowerShell 2.0 abwärtskompatibel.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for Windows PowerShell 2.0 and Windows PowerShell 3.0 run unchanged in Windows PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets, Anbieter, Snap-Ins, Module und Skripts, die für Windows PowerShell 2.0 und Windows PowerShell 3.0 geschrieben wurden, können unverändert in Windows PowerShell 4.0 ausgeführt werden.

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, Windows PowerShell host programs that were written for Windows PowerShell 2.0 and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in Windows PowerShell 3.0, which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Doch aufgrund einer Änderung der Richtlinie für die Laufzeitaktivierung in Microsoft .NET Framework 4 können Windows PowerShell-Hostprogramme, die für Windows PowerShell 2.0 geschrieben und mit Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 kompiliert wurden, nicht unverändert in Windows PowerShell 3.0 ausgeführt werden, das mit CLR 4.0 kompiliert wurde.

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine erfordert mindestens Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Diese Anforderung wird durch Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1 erfüllt.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is not fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and later releases of Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Diese Anforderung wird nicht durch Microsoft .NET Framework 4 und höhere Versionen von Microsoft .NET Framework erfüllt.

trans-unit.source: For information about adding or installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine, and adding or installing the required versions of the Microsoft .NET Framework, see [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Informationen zum Hinzufügen oder Installieren von Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine sowie zum Hinzufügen oder Installieren der erforderlichen Versionen von Microsoft .NET Framework finden Sie unter [Installieren des Windows PowerShell 2.0-Moduls](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Informationen zum Starten von Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine finden Sie unter [Starten des Windows PowerShell 2.0-Moduls](Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: Windows Preinstallation Environment

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 2.0, Windows PowerShell 3.0, and Windows PowerShell 4.0 run in the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 2.0, Windows PowerShell 3.0 und Windows PowerShell 4.0 werden in Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE) ausgeführt.

trans-unit.source: However, the following cmdlets are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Die folgenden Cmdlets werden jedoch nicht unterstützt.

trans-unit.source: Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets für den intelligenten Hintergrundübertragungsdienst (Background Intelligent Transfer Service, BITS)

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-WinEvent
trans-unit.target: Get-WinEvent

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Update-Help
trans-unit.target: Update-Help

trans-unit.source: Also, the **WinRM** service is not present on Windows PE.
trans-unit.target: Darüber hinaus ist der **WinRM**-Dienst nicht in der Windows PE vorhanden.
